title: Digital Clock Watchface
summary: Digital Clock - a watchface for Android Wear

description: Digital Clock watchface for Android Wear is a digtal clock with weather for the current day (used service is YAHOO Weather), a indicator for the batterie of your smartwatch, a alarm clock indicator (active/inactive of your  smartphone).With settings on your mobile device you can change all elements with user defined fonts, you can set user defined colors and can set a wallpaper for your watchface - choose from one from the installed application, or set a picture by your picture gallery. Set the unit for weather (Farenheit, Celsius), or change between 12- or 24 hours clock display.Even you can - in ambient mode/interactive mode - show or hide the battery and alarm clock indicators.Supported Languages: German, English
descriptionHTML:
Digital Clock watchface for Android Wear is a digtal clock with weather for the current day (used service is YAHOO Weather), a indicator for the batterie of your smartwatch, a alarm clock indicator (active/inactive of your smartphone).

With settings on your mobile device you can change all elements with user defined fonts, you can set user defined colors and can set a wallpaper for your watchface - choose from one from the installed application, or set a picture by your picture gallery. Set the unit for weather (Farenheit, Celsius), or change between 12- or 24 hours clock display.
Even you can - in ambient mode/interactive mode - show or hide the battery and alarm clock indicators.

Supported Languages: German, English
comments: Attractive Looks great on my Sony SW3.  Offers a good level of customizability.
Its ok Wish I could get a refund. Its ok
